price: 96. Die naast Allah een andere god nemen, zij zullen het gauw te weten komen.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
